原有视觉数据库 (详细描述)

visual_data.description: Standard issue assault rifle of the Helldivers

json_data.description: The SEAF standard assault rifle, balancing power, fire rate, and weight for a reliable weapon against smaller targets.

visual_data.color_scheme: Military green with yellow warning stripes

json_data.description: A modified Liberator featuring explosive rounds and a red-dot sight. Trades increased damage for increased recoil.

visual_data.description: Compact submachine gun for close quarters

json_data.description: A high-caliber submachine gun which can be fired with one hand. Has a relatively low rate of fire.

visual_data.color_scheme: Black metal with red danger markings

json_data.description: A powerful dual magazine pump-action shotgun, with limited armor penetration. Ideal for small and fast targets.
A fully-automatic shotgun with a high rate of fire, excellent for controlling crowds. Requires frequent reloading.

visual_data.color_scheme: White and blue with energy conduits

json_data.description: A laser rifle firing a continuous beam. Does not need reloading, but if it overheats a new heat sink must be fitted.
The SEAF standard pistol - offering a high fire rate, generous capacity, and fast reloading.
A high-damage revolver, which can be reloaded with single rounds. A heavy-hitting and reliable sidearm.

visual_data.description: Heavy machine gun for suppressive fire

visual_data.color_scheme: Olive green with yellow warning stripes

visual_data.description: Precision red dot sight for improved accuracy

4000666917.name: The Cape of Stars and Suffrage
